Action.author: baohua
Action.body: ~tkuhrt , do you know how's going with the logo design work?

Action.author: tkuhrt
Action.body: ~baohua : I checked with our creative teams. They are currently working on the designs and should get back with you soon.

Action.author: baohua
Action.body: Thanks to the creative team, the new logo file can be found at https://wiki.hyperledger.org/projects/cello/.
